column4: damn, after doing my upgrade, ubuntu is all F'ed up.  ndiswrapper wont load now because of a version mismatch and my x is broken
sudo apt-get -f install
nothing happened
No output, or did it say "0 upgraded, 0 newly installed, 0 to remove and 0 not upgraded." ?
0 newly installed, 0 to remove, 6 not upgraded
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
some index files failed to download, they have been ignored or old ones used instead.
Are you connected to the internet?
yes, Im on the laptop im trying to upgrade typing to you now
Strange, try: sudo apt-get update again just to be sure, if it doesn't work pastebin the output.
I can't pastebin, is there a way I can pipe the content to a text file to send?  >> output.txt doesn't get everything
I've got no X and no console mouse support
Does it mention 404 anywhere?
no, it seems to be saying that the packages are not in gzip format
sub process gzip returned error code (1)
A lot of people have been having that problem today.
so, should I wait? keep trying? or just reinstall Dapper Drake?
On what repositories is it having a problem?
you can try: sudo apt-get clean && sudo apt-get update.
http://us.archive.ubuntu.com edgy/universe packages
I would keep trying.
does: sudo apt-get clean && sudo apt-get update  do anything different?
